detail_desc: Vest top in soft washed cotton jersey with hard-worn details, deep, raw-edge armholes and short slits in the sides.

Playsuit in a soft patterned viscose weave with a small stand-up collar and fasteners at the top. Side pockets and an elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative bow and tassels. Short sleeves and short legs.

Dress in a cotton weave with a collar, button placket, chest pocket with a button and side pockets. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button. Braided belt and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Wide trousers in a cool viscose weave with an elasticated waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Wide trousers in a cool viscose weave with an elasticated waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Wide trousers in a cool viscose weave with an elasticated waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
